channel.title: celery Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in celery Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with celery
item.description: Installation or Setup # You can install Celery either via the Python Package Index (PyPI) or from source. To install the latest version using pip: $ pip install celery To install using easy_install: $ easy_install celery Downloading and installing from source Download the latest version of Celery from http://pypi.python.org/pypi/celery/ You can install it by doing the following: $ tar xvfz celery-0.0.0.tar.gz $ cd celery-0.0.0 $ python setup.py build # python setup.

item.title: Celery monitoring with Flower
item.description: Up and running with Flower # Flower is a web based tool to monitor Celery. To install Flower, we can use pip as follows: pip install flower To run Flower for proj: celery -A proj flower Now, flower is accessible in: http://localhost:5555
